backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the logo replacement in Navbar and Footer components, referencing the generated logo asset and associated test/component metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing the purpose and key changes of each component, context, and style file in the AuraFlora app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the AuraFlora React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the app in CartProvider and composes all page sections (Navbar, Hero, About, Products, Gallery, Contact, Footer, CartDrawer).
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section with an asymmetric grid layout featuring a large display heading, two body paragraphs, and three decorative feature highlight cards with symbols and enlarged titles.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-out cart drawer showing cart items with quantity controls and subtotal, with an inline transition to the CheckoutForm component when the user proceeds.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutForm.tsx: Checkout form collecting name, email, and address with validation; on valid submission it shows an UnderConstructionModal instead of processing an order.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a contact section with a form that opens a mailto link on submission, plus displayed email, WhatsApp, and Instagram contact details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand logo, smooth-scroll navigation links, and social/contact links including Instagram, email, and WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a masonry-style image gallery grid with four botanical images, hover zoom effects, and a decorative blob background element.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, brand name, tagline, and two CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to the gallery and about sections.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a cart icon with item count badge, an enquiry CTA button, and a responsive mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product card with image, name, description, price, and an add-to-cart button that shows a confirmation state after being clicked.
Defines a static array of six botanical products and renders them in a responsive grid using ProductCard components, with a styled section header.
frontend/src/components/UnderConstructio: A modal dialog that informs users checkout is under construction and provides contact buttons (email, WhatsApp, Instagram) as alternatives, with Escape key and backdrop-click dismissal.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a React context for cart state management, including add/remove/update/clear operations, item count, subtotal calculation, cart open/close state, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient, exposing a context provider and hook with login/clear functions, identity state, and login status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines the AuraFlora OKLCH color palette as CSS custom properties for both light and dark themes, plus reusable component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the AuraFlora frontend, defining custom theme extensions including brand colors (oklch), fonts (Cormorant Garamond, Jost), border radii, box shadows, and plugins (typography, container-queries, animate) with dark mode support.
project_state.json: Tracks the AuraFlora project state at version 3, recording one existing feature (logo replacement in Navbar and Footer) and metadata such as clarification mode and schema version.
